00018 /**
00019  * @file adm.c
00020  * support for client adm functions.
00021  */
00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <rpc/rpc.h>
00024 #include "nfsproto.h"
00025 #include "admproto.h"
00026 #include "cfs.h"
00027 
00028 /** maximum index of adm errors */
00029 #define MAXADMERR 7
00030 
00031 char *admerrs[] = {
00032         "no error",                     /* 0 */
00033         "permission denied",            /* 1 */
00034         "too many attached directories",/* 2 */
00035         "no such attached name",        /* 3 */
00036         "name already attached",        /* 4 */
00037         "no such encrypted directory",  /* 5 */
00038         "incorrect passphrase",         /* 6 */
00039         "badly formed name"             /* 7 */
00040         };
00041 
00042 /** return error text associated with error number */
00043 char *admmsg(e)
00044      int e;
00045 {
00046         if ((e>MAXADMERR) || (e<0))
00047                 return "unknown error";
00048         return admerrs[e];
00049 }
